name: Project Tower (TheAlest)
description:
The game is in a pre-alpha status and open to playtest to gather feedbacks.
This mean the game has a lot of issues, from art to gameplay.
Every $ donated to this game will be used to improve the game itself.

New updates every week.

Known issues: Shop does not work, minor graphic glitches.

Tips:
You can use the 1-2-3 to pre-select a skill in combat.
ESC can pause combat to see buffs and stats. 
ESC and SPACEBAR can interact with button (for closing menu, or to go foward in a menu).


Credits:

Alejandro V. Flores L. (Me): Game Director, Main Developer, a lot of editing to 2D assets.

William Testoni: Sound Director, most of the sound in-game.

Chierit (https://www.patreon.com/chierit_pixelart/): most of the playable Characters, (Earth Monk, Fire Knight, Metal Ninja, Wind Assassin, Mineral Dwarf, Water Priestess,  Nature Archer), Bosses: Ice Golem and SlimeDemon.

OcO (https://oco.itch.io): Warrior and BlackSmith characters.

Penusbmic ( https://penusbmic.itch.io/): Sci-fi enemies.

Jesse Munguia (https://jesse-m.itch.io/): Skeleton enemy.

LuizMelo: (https://luizmelo.itch.io/): Fire Worm, Cleric Mage.

Pimen (https://pimen.itch.io/): Vfx Cleric mage ulti.

Clembod (https://clembod.itch.io/): Miasma Bringer Boss.

Reff Pixels  (https://reffpixels.itch.io/): Slime Enemy.

Luca Pixel (https://lucapixel.itch.io/): Focus Bar.
